name: Music_4170.wav
keywords: ['classical/jazzy/piano-composition', 'big burp', 'footsteps sample', 'slow to medium tempo', 'sincere to disgusting atmosphere']
caption: A classical, slightly jazzy piano is playing a lovely composition with a lot of reverb. During the song you can hear footsteps. Someone is running through water. Then at the end someone is burping really loud. This whole composition with the burping could be part of a funny embarrassing scene in a movie.
